thread.title: Market Turmoil Threatens IPO Recovery

author: Maureen Farrell
title: Market Turmoil Threatens IPO Recovery
text:
The IPO market canâ€™t catch a break.
After a protracted stretch in the dumps, January was a record month for U.S. initial public offerings as the strong equity market encouraged a slew of companies to list their shares.
But the turmoil that erupted last week threatens to stop that momentum in its tracks. It also raises questions about whether...
